channel.title: Ijji Gunz Online Working Hack!
channel.description:
Hello, To begin with I didn't create his. The original post can be found [url=http://www.mafiacoders.com/downloads/16432-gunz-fix-1-0-morphine-autologin.html]Here.[/url]
1. Download Gunz.rar 2. Extract "Gunzfix.ddl" and "GunzFix.exe" to your gunz folder. 3. Create a shortcut of GunzFix.exe and put it on your desktop Note: Make sure when you create the shortut that you create the shortvut from the GunzFix.exe in your Gunz folder. If you don't it will not work. 3. Run Gunz.exe and do what it says until the Gunz Launcher comes up 4. When it says "press any key to implant DLL file" 5. Then press Start Game 6. Go back to GunzFix.exe and press ENTER
Controls:
Alt + S = spawn hack Alt + F = Flip mover Alt + L = Lawn Mover Alt + M = MAssive 1 = Grenade spawn 2 = Go backwards 3 = Rockey spawn 4 = Fly left 5 = Fly upwards 6 = Fly right 7 = Flash spawn 8 = Fly fordwards 9 = Smoke spawn
-Arr0w

item.title: Ijji Gunz Online Working Hack!
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

Hello,
To begin with I didn’t create his. The original post can be found Here.

  1. Download Gunz.rar
  2. Extract “Gunzfix.ddl” and “GunzFix.exe” to your gunz folder.
  3. Create a shortcut of GunzFix.exe and put it on your desktop
    Note: Make sure when you create the shortut that you create the shortvut from the GunzFix.exe in your Gunz folder. If you don’t it will not work.
  4. Run Gunz.exe and do what it says until the Gunz Launcher comes up
  5. When it says “press any key to implant DLL file”
  6. Then press Start Game
  7. Go back to GunzFix.exe and press ENTER

Controls:

Alt + S = spawn hack
Alt + F = Flip mover
Alt + L = Lawn Mover
Alt + M = MAssive
1 = Grenade spawn
2 = Go backwards
3 = Rockey spawn
4 = Fly left
5 = Fly upwards
6 = Fly right
7 = Flash spawn
8 = Fly fordwards
9 = Smoke spawn

-Arr0w

Read full topic
